exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.description:
Targets: Quads, glutes, hamstrings.
How to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend your knees, and lower your body as if sitting back into a chair. Keep your chest up and back straight.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description:
Targets: Chest, triceps, shoulders.
How to: Start in a plank position and lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground. Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description:
Targets: Core.
How to: Get into a plank position, forearms on the ground, and maintain a straight line from head to heels. Hold the position, engaging your core muscles.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description:
Targets: Quads, glutes, hamstrings.
How to: Take a step forward with one leg, lower your body until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle, then push off with your back foot and bring it forward into the next lunge.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description:
Targets: Triceps.
How to: Use a sturdy chair or elevated surface, lower your body by bending your elbows, then push back up.

exercises.name: Supermans
exercises.description:
Targets: Lower back, glutes.
How to: Lie face down on the ground, lift your arms and legs off the ground simultaneously, then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description:
Targets: Full body, cardiovascular system.
How to: Stand with feet together, jump while spreading your arms and legs, then jump back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Running in Place
exercises.description:
Targets: Cardiovascular system.
How to: Lift your knees towards your chest while running in place, maintaining a brisk pace.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description:
Targets: Cardiovascular system, quads.
How to: Lift your knees towards your chest while jogging in place at a faster pace.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description:
Targets: Full body, cardiovascular system.
How to: Start in a standing position, perform a squat, kick your feet back into a plank, perform a push-up, jump your feet back to your hands, and then jump up.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description:
Targets: Cardiovascular system, core.
How to: Get into a plank position, bring one knee towards your chest, then switch legs in a running motion.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description:
Targets: Cardiovascular system, calves.
How to: Use an imaginary jump rope or a real one if available, jump continuously for the specified time.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description:
Targets: Abdominals.
How to: Lie on your back, bend your knees, and lift your upper body towards your knees.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description:
Targets: Lower abs.
How to: Lie on your back, lift your legs towards the ceiling, then lower them back down without letting them touch the ground.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description:
Targets: Obliques, core.
How to: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, and twist your torso to touch the ground on each side.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description:
Targets: Core.
How to: Get into a plank position, forearms on the ground, and maintain a straight line from head to heels. Hold the position, engaging your core muscles.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description:
Targets: Abdominals, obliques.
How to: Lie on your back, bring one knee towards your chest while twisting your upper body to touch the opposite elbow to the knee. Switch sides.

exercises.name: Reverse Crunches
exercises.description:
Targets: Lower abs.
How to: Lie on your back, lift your legs towards the ceiling, and lift your hips off the ground towards your chest.

exercises.name: Side Planks
exercises.description:
Targets: Obliques, core.
How to: Lie on your side, lift your body off the ground using your forearm, and hold a side plank position.

exercises.name: Rest
exercises.description: Take a day off to allow your body to recover and rejuvenate. Consider light activities such as walking or stretching if desired.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description:
Targets: Full body, cardiovascular system.
How to: Stand with feet together, jump while spreading your arms and legs, then jump back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.description:
Targets: Quads, glutes, hamstrings.
How to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend your knees, and lower your body as if sitting back into a chair. Keep your chest up and back straight.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description:
Targets: Chest, triceps, shoulders.
How to: Start in a plank position and lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground. Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description:
Targets: Core.
How to: Get into a plank position, forearms on the ground, and maintain a straight line from head to heels. Hold the position, engaging your core muscles.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description:
Targets: Cardiovascular system, calves.
How to: Use an imaginary jump rope or a real one if available, jump continuously for the specified time.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description:
Targets: Quads, glutes, hamstrings.
How to: Take a step forward with one leg, lower your body until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle, then push off with your back foot and bring it forward into the next lunge.

exercises.name: Supermans
exercises.description:
Targets: Lower back, glutes.
How to: Lie face down on the ground, lift your arms and legs off the ground simultaneously, then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Light Jogging in Place
exercises.description:
Targets: Cardiovascular system.
How to: Lift your knees towards your chest while jogging in place at a moderate pace.

exercises.name: Dynamic Stretching
exercises.description:
Targets: Flexibility, mobility.
How to: Perform dynamic stretches, such as leg swings, arm circles, and torso twists, to prepare your body for movement.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description:
Targets: Full body, cardiovascular system.
How to: Stand with feet together, jump while spreading your arms and legs, then jump back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description:
Targets: Cardiovascular system, calves.
How to: Use an imaginary jump rope or a real one if available, jump continuously for the specified time.

exercises.name: Static Stretching
exercises.description:
Targets: Flexibility, cooldown.
How to: Hold static stretches for major muscle groups, such as hamstrings, quadriceps, chest, and shoulders, to improve flexibility and cool down.

exercises.name: Rest or Light Activity
exercises.description: Take a day off to allow your body to recover. Consider light activities such as walking, cycling, or gentle yoga if desired.
